name: part_000
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア4周年記念LIVE】平成初期アニソン祭り【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [7lJ5kdZGFgk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Intro wait screen for the live performance featuring chibi illustrations of Hololive members.
Shiranui Flare performs 'WILL', the opening theme of 'Senkaiden Houshin Engi'.
MC section where Shiranui Flare greets the audience and introduces the theme of the live.

subtitles.original:
平成初期アニソン祭り
不知火フレア 4th anniversary
subtitles.english:
Early Heisei Anime Song Festival
Shiranui Flare 4th Anniversary

subtitles.original: 夢の国を探す君の名を
subtitles.english: Searching for your name, seeking the land of dreams

subtitles.original:
WILL
作詞：米倉千尋・徳永英三
作曲：徳永英三
subtitles.english:
WILL
Lyrics: Chihiro Yonekura, Eizo Tokunaga
Composition: Eizo Tokunaga

subtitles.original: 誰もが心に刻むまで
subtitles.english: Until everyone carves it into their hearts

subtitles.original: 悲しみ乗り越えた微笑みに
subtitles.english: In the smile that overcame sadness

subtitles.original: 君を信じていいですか
subtitles.english: Can I believe in you?

subtitles.original: 終わりがなくて 見つけられなくって
subtitles.english: Endless and unable to find

subtitles.original: 迷ったりしたけれど
subtitles.english: I wandered, but...

subtitles.original: 傷ついたこと 失ったもの
subtitles.english: The things that hurt, the things I lost

subtitles.original: いつかは輝きに変えて
subtitles.english: I'll turn them into radiance someday

subtitles.original: 後悔に決して負けない翼が
subtitles.english: Wings that will never yield to regret

subtitles.original: きっとあるから
subtitles.english: I'm sure they are there

subtitles.original: 君とならどこでも
subtitles.english: With you, anywhere...

subtitles.original: 行ける気がする
subtitles.english: I feel like I can go

subtitles.original: 夢の国を探す君の名を
subtitles.english: Searching for your name, seeking the land of dreams

subtitles.original: 誰もが心に刻むまで
subtitles.english: Until everyone carves it into their hearts

subtitles.original: 悲しみ乗り越えた微笑みに
subtitles.english: In the smile that overcame sadness

subtitles.original: 君を信じていいですか
subtitles.english: Can I believe in you?

subtitles.original: 君を信じていいですか
subtitles.english: Can I believe in you?

subtitles.original: みなさーん、こんぬいー！
subtitles.english: Hello everyone, Konnui!

subtitles.original: 不知火フレアです！
subtitles.english: I'm Shiranui Flare!

subtitles.original: 今日は私の4周年記念LIVE「平成初期アニソン祭り」へようこそ！
subtitles.english: Welcome to my 4th anniversary live, "Early Heisei Anime Song Festival", today!

subtitles.original: 1曲目は「仙界伝 封神演義」のオープニングテーマ「WILL」でした！
subtitles.english: The first song was "WILL", the opening theme of "Senkaiden Houshin Engi"!

subtitles.original: 今日はね、みんなが知ってる懐かしい曲をたくさん用意してきたから、
subtitles.english: Today, I've prepared many nostalgic songs that everyone knows,
